Understanding Databases
Before the age of computers, we used typewriters and various mechanical
calculators to record data and perform mathematical operations with it.
That data was then stored in massive rooms packed with cabinets and
boxes with paperwork.Nowadays,we don't have to rely on limiting
physical space to keep track of information.We have computers and
databases.
